Jordan Lagan

Full-Stack Software Engineer & Web Developer

Extensive experience building web applications across multiple industries and tech stacks. Creating custom solutions tailored to unique challenges.

My Experience

My Background

I got my first developer job in 2017 after graduating from a coding bootcamp called Bloc.io. Since then I've led departments, built enterprise level web apps used by hundreds of companies and developed websites for multimillion dollar brands.

I'm passionate about writing clean, maintainable code and using my creativity to solve complex technical challenges. There's nothing more satisfying than building awesome solutions that genuinely help people and make their lives easier. Every project is an opportunity to learn something new and create something meaningful.

Featured Projects

Some of the work I'm most proud of

DataPulse

DataPulse is a digital marketing tool that helps agencies & businesses visualize the performance of their marketing campaigns in real-time. It pulls data from various APIs on-demand and displays dashboards that can be shared with clients. This project was built using Ruby on Rails and a frontend in React.

Learn More

Blog Autopilot

Blog Autopilot is an AI-powered content generation tool that helps businesses and creators automate their blog publishing workflow. It generates SEO-optimized articles, and supports auto publishing to various platforms. Built with Ruby on Rails with jQuery for frontend. Uses OpenAI API for content generation.

Learn More

Kaiwa

Kaiwa is a lightweight & highly customizable solution for adding comments to any website. Users can create comment boxes in Kaiwa, then install them using a simple tag. This is a work in progress. The backend is written in Ruby on Rails, but the kaiwa.js script is pure JavaScript.

Learn More
View All Projects
